author: Special Correspondent
text:
The semester examinations of all the affiliated colleges of Periyar University will commence on April 1 and will be continued till April 30.

The University has uploaded the semester examination timetable in the University website and the students can view the timetable with the following link:www.periyaruniversity.ac.in.

Students can also get the timetable from their respective colleges, an official press release of the Periyar University issued here on Sunday said.
title: Periyar University exams from April 1
